divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side and looked up. It was cloudy but I saw this big object coming across my yard in the sky. It was as big as a football field with lights going slow with no noise at all I watched it go over me and I felt weard like it was no big deal real strange. I went in and told my wife but acted like it was no diffrent than if I saw a car. Real strange I thought.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Potosi
There were no other sightings in Potosi on or around June 12th 2004
Summary: Gigantic circle with lights diffrent color lights.
